title: Person Medium Light Skin Tone Curly Hair
description: Represents a person with medium-light skin tone and curly hair, used to depict individuals or a general representation of people with these features.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendering of the person emoji with medium-light skin tone and curly hair features a vibrant, bouncy texture to the hair, enhanced by Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients. The facial expression is typically neutral or slightly smiling, with soft, rounded features that feel approachable and friendly. This emoji, with its distinct hairstyle, is a stylish way to represent an individual and add personality to messages on Apple devices.
